TopicTitle: I've pretty much run out of science fiction movies

Articles.Content: I like those really lonely, non action, science fiction movies like Moon, Solaris, 2001, and 2010. But I can't really think of anything else. At least ones that I haven't already seen. What am I missing and what should I watch to keep my head from melting?

Silent Running. Just one guy, alone in space, tending a space-bound forest which represents the last examples of life on Earth. His only company is a pair of little maintenance robots. To some it's a preachy ecowarrior movie; but it's also slow, quiet and contemplative.
